message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $12000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the chance to purchase the product at a special introductory price of $13500. This offer is designed to provide you with a unique advantage while ensuring a fair return on my investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
